title: Sky High Fibre Creamy Toast Plain

schema.name: Sky-High Fibre Creamy Toast - Plain
recipeIngredient: 0.50 Cup ( 8 oz--250 ml ), Ice Cold Water

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the large egg in a bowl until smooth.
Add milk powder and ice cold water to the egg and continue to whisk until the mixture is well combined.
Stir in the quick cook oats and sugar substitute into the mixture, ensuring everything is evenly distributed.
Preheat a non-stick skillet or pan over medium heat.
Soak each slice of whole wheat bread in the mixture, ensuring both sides are well coated.
Cook the soaked bread slices on the preheated skillet for about 2 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Serve the creamy toast hot, ideally with a side of fresh fruits or a dollop of your favorite low-sugar jam for an extra burst of flavor.

schema.description: Enjoy a healthier start to your day with our Sky-High Fibre Creamy Toast - Plain, a masterpiece crafted for those who appreciate low-sugar, healthified recipes. This dish combines the wholesome goodness of whole wheat bread, oats, and protein from egg, creating a balanced and nutritious breakfast that keeps you fueled.
